Dialogue.Page: Mod: Under a Radio Moon Authors: Etherpod, Ditzy, harperlr, Ernst
Under a Radio Moon is a mod made for the fifth mod jam hosted by the Outer Wilds modding community. The mod takes place on an abandoned, rusty moon with a signal coming from one of the structures.
The mod is one of two mods in Jam 5 that feature completely new species, and provides the player with intriguing puzzles to solve.
Perhaps this mod will find itself on the leaderboard?
